m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- CHARGING PURCHASES TO UTILITY ACCOUNTS United States Patent Application 20120116955 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: Charging purchases to utility accounts including a computer program product that stores instructions for implementing a method. The method includes receiving a request from a consumer at an electric vehicle charging station to charge at least one of a purchase of electrical power for electric vehicle (EV) charging and an item other than electrical power to an electrical power utility account.
